item.title: Data Wrangling
item.description: Table of Content 1 Introduction 2 Loading the libraries and the data 3 Overview of the data 1 Introduction Never stop learning ! The entry into the field of data science with “R / R-Studio” was a smart matter. Now it’s time and for each Data Scientist advisable to learn another scripting language. Let’s start with Python! For this post the dataset flight from the statistic platform “Kaggle” was used.
